Uses of Interface
org.bukkit.attributes.AttributeModifier

  • Packages that use AttributeModifier 
    Package Description
    org.bukkit.attributes  
    org.bukkit.inventory.meta
    The interfaces used when manipulating extra data can can be stored inside item stacks.

    • Uses of AttributeModifier in org.bukkit.attributes

      Methods in org.bukkit.attributes that return AttributeModifier 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AttributeModifier AttributeValue.getModifier(UUID id)
      Get the AttributeModifier with the given UUID, or null if no such modifier has been applied to this attribute.
      AttributeModifier AttributeFactory.newAttributeModifier(String name, double value, AttributeModifier.Operation operation)
      Return a newly created AttributeModifier, with an automatically generated UUID.
      AttributeModifier AttributeFactory.newAttributeModifier(UUID id, String name, double value, AttributeModifier.Operation operation)
      Return a newly created AttributeModifier.
      Methods in org.bukkit.attributes with parameters of type AttributeModifier 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AttributeValue.addModifier(AttributeModifier modifier)
      Add the given modifier to the set modifying this attribute.
      boolean AttributeValue.hasModifier(AttributeModifier modifier)
      Has the given modifier been applied to this attribute?
      void AttributeOwner.removeAttributeModifier(AttributeModifier modifier)
      Remove the given AttributeModifier from all of this owner's AttributeValues.
      void AttributeValue.removeModifier(AttributeModifier modifier)
      Remove the given modifier from the set modifying this attribute.
